(Okay, this thing between Kinger and JP is, I think getting out of 
hand. It's turning into a bitter war over nothing. I think it needs 
to be over with before it gets even worse. Kinger, what you sent 
calling JP a name was unneccissary. I'm not taking sides, but I'm 
displeased of what you sent. I don't like to see people mad over 
something petty. I suggest, if this is not settled peacefully soon, 
you both apologize, nothing big, then get on with things.)



--Talon
